name: Process BS Seeker2 Aligner
title: BS Seeker2 Aligner
short_description: Align WGBS data, uses BS Seeker2 and Bowtie2. For full details about all parameters please consult the BS Seeker2 aligner documentation at https://github.com/BSSeeker/BSseeker2#43-bs_seeker2-alignpy

input_files.name: fastq1
input_files.help: path to a FASTQ sequence read file

input_files.name: fastq2
input_files.help: path to a FASTQ sequence read file

input_files.name: genome
input_files.help: path to a assembly sequence file

input_files.name: index
input_files.help: path to a assembly sequence file

arguments.name: aligner
arguments.description: Name of the aligner
arguments.help: Name of the aligner

arguments.name: aligner_path
arguments.description: Location of the aligner libraries
arguments.help: Location of the aligner libraries

arguments.name: bss_path
arguments.description: Location of the BS Seeker2 code libraries
arguments.help: Location of the BS Seeker2 code libraries

arguments.name: bss_aligner_rrbs_param
arguments.description: Reads are to be mapped to a reduced representation genome (RRBS)
arguments.help: Reads are to be mapped to a reduced representation genome

arguments.name: bss_aligner_rrbs_cutoff_site_param
arguments.description: RRBS cut site
arguments.help: Restrivtion enzyme cutting site

arguments.name: bss_aligner_rrbs_lower_param
arguments.description: RRBS Lower bound fragment length
arguments.help: RRBS Lower bound fragment length

arguments.name: bss_aligner_rrbs_upper_param
arguments.description: RRBS Upper bound fragment length
arguments.help: RRBS Upper bound fragment length

arguments.name: bss_aligner_tag_param
arguments.description: Unidirectional (Y), or Directional (N)
arguments.help: Unidirectional (Y), or Directional (N)

arguments.name: bss_aligner_start_base_param
arguments.description: Start base
arguments.help: Start base

arguments.name: bss_aligner_end_base_param
arguments.description: End base
arguments.help: End base

arguments.name: bss_aligner_split_line_param
arguments.description: Number of allowed mismatches. Whole integers is equivalent to number of mismatches, Number less than or equal to 1 is equivalent to the percentage number of mismatches (eg 0.1 is 10%)

arguments.name: bowtie2_interleaved_param
arguments.description: Interleaved reads, where the first 2 reads represent a paired end
arguments.help: Interleaved reads, where the first 2 reads represent a paired end

arguments.name: bowtie2_tab5_param
arguments.description: All reads, or pairs of reads, are a single line

arguments.name: bowtie2_tab6_param
arguments.description: Same as tab5 except the the second paired-end read can have a different name

arguments.name: bowtie2_skip_1st_n_reads_param
arguments.description: Skip the first N reads in a FastQ file

arguments.name: bowtie2_aln_1st_n_reads_param
arguments.description: Align only the first N reads from a FastQ file

arguments.name: bowtie2_trim5_param
arguments.description: Trim the 5' end of all reads before alignment
arguments.help: Trim the 5' end of all reads before alignment

arguments.name: bowtie2_trim3_param
arguments.description: Trim the 3' end of all reads before alignment
arguments.help: Trim the 3' end of all reads before alignment

arguments.name: bowtie2_phred33_param
arguments.description: Input score are equivalent to Phred+33
arguments.help: Input score are equivalent to Phred+33

arguments.name: bowtie2_phre64_param
arguments.description: Input score are equivalent to Phred+64
arguments.help: Input score are equivalent to Phred+64

arguments.name: bowtie2_num_mismatch_param
arguments.description: Number of mismatches allowed in the seed in multiseed alignments
arguments.help: Number of mismatches allowed in the seed in multiseed alignments

arguments.name: bowtie2_seed_len_param
arguments.description: Length of seed substring used in mutliseed alignments
arguments.help: Length of seed substring used in mutliseed alignments

arguments.name: bowtie2_dpads_param
arguments.description: Padding used in dynamic programming to allow for gaps
arguments.help: Padding used in dynamic programming to allow for gaps

arguments.name: bowtie2_gbar_param
arguments.description: Don't allow gaps within N bases of an aligned read
arguments.help: Don't allow gaps within N bases of an aligned read

arguments.name: bowtie2_ignore_quals_param
arguments.description: Use a high read quality in cases of gaps instead of the quality score
arguments.help: Use a high read quality in cases of gaps instead of the quality score

arguments.name: bowtie2_nofw_param
arguments.description: Do not align unpaired reads to the forward strand
arguments.help: Do not align unpaired reads to the forward strand

arguments.name: bowtie2_norc_param
arguments.description: Do not align unpaired reads to the reverse strand
arguments.help: Do not align unpaired reads to the reverse strand

arguments.name: bowtie2_no_1mm_upfront_param
arguments.description: Prevent Bowtie2 searching for alignments with 1 mismatch before using a multiseed approach to alignment
arguments.help: Prevent Bowtie2 searching for alignments with 1 mismatch before using a multiseed approach to alignment

arguments.name: bowtie2_end_to_end_param
arguments.description: The read should completely align to the reference genome
arguments.help: The read should completely align to the reference genome

arguments.name: bowtie2_local_param
arguments.description: Allow soft-clipping to get an alignment
arguments.help: Allow soft-clipping to get an alignment

arguments.name: bowtie2_seed_extension_attempts_param
arguments.description: Number of seed extension attempts allowed before moving on
arguments.help: Number of seed extension attempts allowed before moving on

arguments.name: bowtie2_reseed_param
arguments.description: Max number of re-seeds if a read has repetitive seeds
arguments.help: Max number of re-seeds if a read has repetitive seeds

arguments.name: bowtie2_min_frag_len_param
arguments.description: Minimum fragment length for a valid pair alignment
arguments.help: Minimum fragment length for a valid pair alignment

arguments.name: bowtie2_max_frag_len_param
arguments.description: Max fragment length for a valid pair alignment
arguments.help: Max fragment length for a valid pair alignment

arguments.name: bowtie2_frrfff_param
arguments.description:
Upstream/Downstream paired-end mate orientations:
--fr : Mate 1 upstream of reversed mate 2
--rf : Reversed mate 1 is upstream of mate 2
--ff : Mate 1 upstream and mate 2 downstream bothin forward direction
arguments.help:
Upstream/Downstream paired-end mate orientations:
--fr : Mate 1 upstream of reversed mate 2
--rf : Reversed mate 1 is upstream of mate 2
--ff : Mate 1 upstream and mate 2 downstream bothin forward direction

arguments.name: bowtie2_no_mixed_param
arguments.description: Find only concordant/discordant alignments for pairs
arguments.help: Find only concordant/discordant alignments for pairs

arguments.name: bowtie2_no_discordant_param
arguments.description: If there are no concordant pair alignments, do not search for discordant pairs
arguments.help: If there are no concordant pair alignments, do not search for discordant pairs

arguments.name: bowtie2_dovetail_param
arguments.description: Allow mates to dovetail each other. For further details see http://bowtie-bio.sourceforge.net/bowtie2/manual.shtml#mates-can-overlap-contain-or-dovetail-each-other
arguments.help: Allow mates to dovetail each other. For further details see http://bowtie-bio.sourceforge.net/bowtie2/manual.shtml#mates-can-overlap-contain-or-dovetail-each-other

arguments.name: bowtie2_no_contain_param
arguments.description: Don't allow mates to contain its paired mate. For further details see http://bowtie-bio.sourceforge.net/bowtie2/manual.shtml#mates-can-overlap-contain-or-dovetail-each-other
arguments.help: Don't allow mates to contain its paired mate. For further details see http://bowtie-bio.sourceforge.net/bowtie2/manual.shtml#mates-can-overlap-contain-or-dovetail-each-other

arguments.name: bowtie2_no_overlap_param
arguments.description: Don't allow mates to overlap each other. For further details see http://bowtie-bio.sourceforge.net/bowtie2/manual.shtml#mates-can-overlap-contain-or-dovetail-each-other
arguments.help: Don't allow mates to overlap each other. For further details see http://bowtie-bio.sourceforge.net/bowtie2/manual.shtml#mates-can-overlap-contain-or-dovetail-each-other

arguments.name: bowtie2_no_unal_param
arguments.description: No SAM records for unaligned reads
arguments.help: No SAM records for unaligned reads

arguments.name: bowtie2_no_hd_param
arguments.description: No SAM header lines
arguments.help: No SAM header lines

arguments.name: bowtie2_no_sq_param
arguments.description: No @SQ SAM header lines
arguments.help: No @SQ SAM header lines

arguments.name: bowtie2_rg_id_param
arguments.description: Read group ID
arguments.help: Read group ID

arguments.name: bowtie2_rg_param
arguments.description: Extra text for @RG header line
arguments.help: Extra text for @RG header line

arguments.name: bowtie2_omit_sec_seq_param
arguments.description: Do not include sequence and quality lines when printing secondary alignments
arguments.help: Do not include sequence and quality lines when printing secondary alignments

arguments.name: bowtie2_soft_clipped_unmapped_tlen_param
arguments.description: Soft-clipped bases are assigned as unmapped when calculating TLEN
arguments.help: Soft-clipped bases are assigned as unmapped when calculating TLEN

arguments.name: bowtie2_sam_no_qname_trunc_param
arguments.description: Use full read name (including whitespace). This will generate non-standard format SAM files
arguments.help: Use full read name (including whitespace). This will generate non-standard format SAM files

arguments.name: bowtie2_xeq_param
arguments.description: To indicate matches/mis-matches use '='/'X' instead of 'M'
arguments.help: To indicate matches/mis-matches use '='/'X' instead of 'M'

arguments.name: bowtie2_ma_param
arguments.description: Match bonus
arguments.help: Match bonus

arguments.name: bowtie2_mp_mx_param
arguments.description: Max mismatch penalty [Requires Min mismatch penalty to also be set]
arguments.help: Max mismatch penalty [Requires Min mismatch penalty to also be set]

arguments.name: bowtie2_mp_mn_param
arguments.description: Min mismatch penalty [Requires Max mismatch penalty to also be set]
arguments.help: Min mismatch penalty [Requires Max mismatch penalty to also be set]

arguments.name: bowtie2_np_param
arguments.description: Penalty for positions where the read or reference are ambiguous
arguments.help: Penalty for positions where the read or reference are ambiguous

arguments.name: bowtie2_rdg_o_param
arguments.description: Read gap open penalty [Requires read gap extension penalty to also be set]
arguments.help: Read gap open penalty [Requires read gap extension penalty to also be set]

arguments.name: bowtie2_rdg_e_param
arguments.description: Read gap extension penalty [Requires read gap open penalty to also be set]
arguments.help: Read gap extension penalty [Requires read gap open penalty to also be set]

arguments.name: bowtie2_rfg_o_param
arguments.description: Reference gap open penalty [Requires reference gap extension penalty to also be set]
arguments.help: Reference gap open penalty [Requires reference gap extension penalty to also be set]

arguments.name: bowtie2_rfg_e_param
arguments.description: Reference gap extension penalty [Requires reference gap open penalty to also be set]
arguments.help: Reference gap extension penalty [Requires reference gap open penalty to also be set]
